topics.body:
Honestly if someone were to have that much power the most ethical use of that sort of power without killing anyone or using your powers to overwhelm other's will is to in situations that are legitimately dire to have each permutation of a potential outcome happen and the one where the dire outcome happens doesn't happen.

Basically if *GOD* is real the most ethical way of using all mighty powers would be to stop people from destroying all of reality by making the exact point where they destroy all of the universe never happen in the first place and make it where their reality destroying device fails to work.

Davros, "Fire the reality bomb!"
*reality bomb fails*
Davros, "Impossible!  The reality bomb had a 100.0000000000% chance of working!"
*the .00000000000000000000000000000000000000001% chance of it failing is what actually happens*

topics.body:
So Louisiana gave up fighting gay marriage when their own court ruled gay marriage law.

The USA is the #1 country with the most population that allows gay marriage.



Also talks about greece are breaking down complete.  Time to panic Europeans cause the two most probable outcomes are:
1)Greece leaves the European Union.
2)The European Union Breaks apart.

topics.body:
For those of you that are in Europe I'm not kidding about time to panic, cause Greece's economic decline is on par with the great depression.

When I say two options you really have three, but you'd have to be fucking metaphorically retarded to accept the third.

Options for Europe:
1)Greece leaves the European Union.
2)European Union breaks up.
3)Europe hit by a great depression and all of Europe is fucked.
